subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|辵|alt1=辶|t1=movement|屰|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – going in the opposite direction, contrary, disobedient.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ŋra-k/ŋ||to meet; to encounter}}. Cognate with {{och-l|迎|to receive, to welcome; to face, to go against}} and {{och-l|額|forehead}}.
